# A null 'IPv4Address' or 'IPv6Address' means it's not configured.
# A null 'Modules' means it can't be determined.
#
# 'SpecialModules' for M17 reflectors will pass encrypted voice data.
# 'SpecialModules' for URF reflectors are fully transcoded.
#
# A null 'SpecialModules' value can mean either:
#   1) If 'Modules' is null, it can't be determined, or,
#   2) if 'Modules' is NOT null, there are no special modules.
#
